page.title: 02Land at Harvills Hawthorn
page.content: There is one park in the block.It is a large flat square of grass with a few newly planted trees in one corner and a small children's play area with swings and slide in the corner. Harvills Hawthorn Junior and Infant Schools each have very large playing fields and tarmac playgrounds.The playing fields are bordered with a variety of mature trees and a newly planted hawthorn hedge. Off Harvills Hawthorn there is a large area of derelict land where a row of terraced houses once stood. Off Bagnall Street there is a derelict steel storage depot. The whole area of land in the northern half of the block is derelict.
